original: Ericsson, Erik Gösta, komminister, Föra, f. 4/8/06 i Oskarshamn av Erik E. o. Adéde Frid. G. 32 m. Gudrun Werner. Barn: Sigrun f. 38, Dag 43, Kerstin 47. — Stud:ex. i Lund 27, teol. fil. ex. där 29, teol. kand., prakt. teol. prov o. prästv. f. Växjö stift 31. Tjg. !S. past:adj. i Oskarshamn o. Gällaryd, v. kommin. i Bilädinge isamt s j ömans-pastor i Melbourne, kommin. i Föra ’sed. 38. Vik. ’lärov:adj. i Oskarshamn 32 o. vik. folkskoll. i Föra 39-40. Ordf. o. kassör i barnav:ndn, ordf. i kyrkoråd, ordf. i skolstyr., kyrkostämma o. bibi :styr., v. ordf. i RK-krets, led. av komm :fullm., riksinstr. i NTO sed. 46, led. av NTO-vänn. förtr :råd m. m., v. .scoutchef för NTOs scoutförb. m. m. Reis. it. Noirge, EnigL, Ita!., USA, Ausitir. o. Ceydon. Skr.: art. i tidn. o. tidskr.
translated: Ericsson, Erik Gösta, assistant pastor, Föra, born on August 4, 1906 in Oskarshamn to Erik E. and Adéde Frid. Married in 1932 to Gudrun Werner. Children: Sigrun b. 1938, Dag b. 1943, Kerstin b. 1947. — Graduated from Lund University in 1927, received theological degree in 1929, passed practical theology exam and ordained as priest in Växjö diocese in 1931. Served as assistant pastor in Oskarshamn and Gällaryd, deputy vicar in Bilädinge, seaman's pastor in Melbourne, and parish priest in Föra since 1938. Temporary teacher in Oskarshamn in 1932 and temporary elementary school teacher in Föra from 1939-1940. Chairman and treasurer of the children's welfare organization, chairman of the church council, chairman of the school committee, church assembly and library council, vice-chairman of the temperance society and member of the municipal council. National board member of the temperance organization since 1946, member of the temperance friendship council, scout leader for the temperance scout association, and more. Traveled to Norway, England, Italy, USA, Australia, and Ceylon. Author of articles in newspapers and magazines.

memberOf.name: The National Board of the Temperance Organization
